I can't believe she did that to me! After everything I've done for her! It's just so unfair and disrespectful!
She went behind my back and started dating my ex-boyfriend. Doesn't she know that's a betrayal of our friendship? Seriously, I can't even look at her right now.
That sounds really difficult. Have you talked to her about how you feel?
No, I haven't spoken to her yet. I'm just too angry to have a calm conversation right now.
Maybe it would help to take some time to cool down before approaching her. It's important to express how you feel, but being too angry might make the situation more volatile.
You're right. I don't want to say something that I'll regret later. I just need to calm down and think of the best way to approach this.
Taking some time to gather your thoughts can be really helpful. Is there anything that usually helps you relax and let go of anger?
Usually, I go for a run or listen to some loud music. It helps release some of the tension.
That sounds like a great idea. Physical activities and music can be really cathartic. I hope it helps you feel better soon.
Thanks for listening. I appreciate your advice.
Anytime. If you need someone to talk to, I'm here for you.
